welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Seven Oaks, where the charm of small town America awaits you. Get ready to explore our quaint streets, rich history, and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in our beautiful city."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Metropolitan Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Metropolitan Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Owens Field Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Owens Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
